00461 MINLINE float dot_v2v2(const float a[2], const float b[2])
00462 {
00463     return a[0] * b[0] + a[1] * b[1];
00464 }
00465 
00466 MINLINE float dot_v3v3(const float a[3], const float b[3])
00467 {
00468     return a[0] * b[0] + a[1] * b[1] + a[2] * b[2];
00469 }

00471 MINLINE float cross_v2v2(const float a[2], const float b[2])
00472 {
00473     return a[0] * b[1] - a[1] * b[0];
00474 }
00475 
00476 MINLINE void cross_v3_v3v3(float r[3], const float a[3], const float b[3])
00477 {
00478     r[0] = a[1] * b[2] - a[2] * b[1];
00479     r[1] = a[2] * b[0] - a[0] * b[2];
00480     r[2] = a[0] * b[1] - a[1] * b[0];
00481 }
00482 
00483 /* Newell's Method */
00484 /* excuse this fairly spesific function,
00485  * its used for polygon normals all over the place
00486  * could use a better name */
00487 MINLINE void add_newell_cross_v3_v3v3(float n[3], const float v_prev[3], const float v_curr[3])
00488 {
00489     n[0] += (v_prev[1] - v_curr[1]) * (v_prev[2] + v_curr[2]);
00490     n[1] += (v_prev[2] - v_curr[2]) * (v_prev[0] + v_curr[0]);
00491     n[2] += (v_prev[0] - v_curr[0]) * (v_prev[1] + v_curr[1]);
00492 }
00493 
00494 MINLINE void star_m3_v3(float rmat[][3], float a[3])
00495 {
00496     rmat[0][0] = rmat[1][1] = rmat[2][2] = 0.0;
00497     rmat[0][1] = -a[2];
00498     rmat[0][2] = a[1];
00499     rmat[1][0] = a[2];
00500     rmat[1][2] = -a[0];
00501     rmat[2][0] = -a[1];
00502     rmat[2][1] = a[0];
00503 }

00507 MINLINE float len_squared_v2(const float v[2])
00508 {
00509     return v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1];
00510 }
00511 
00512 MINLINE float len_squared_v3(const float v[3])
00513 {
00514     return v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1] + v[2] * v[2];
00515 }
00516 
00517 MINLINE float len_v2(const float v[2])
00518 {
00519     return sqrtf(v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1]);
00520 }
00521 
00522 MINLINE float len_v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00523 {
00524     float x, y;
00525 
00526     x = v1[0] - v2[0];
00527     y = v1[1] - v2[1];
00528     return sqrtf(x * x + y * y);
00529 }
00530 
00531 MINLINE float len_v3(const float a[3])
00532 {
00533     return sqrtf(dot_v3v3(a, a));
00534 }
00535 
00536 MINLINE float len_squared_v2v2(const float a[2], const float b[2])
00537 {
00538     float d[2];
00539 
00540     sub_v2_v2v2(d, b, a);
00541     return dot_v2v2(d, d);
00542 }
00543 
00544 MINLINE float len_v3v3(const float a[3], const float b[3])
00545 {
00546     float d[3];
00547 
00548     sub_v3_v3v3(d, b, a);
00549     return len_v3(d);
00550 }
00551 
00552 MINLINE float len_squared_v3v3(const float a[3], const float b[3])

00554     float d[3];
00555 
00556     sub_v3_v3v3(d, b, a);
00557     return dot_v3v3(d, d);
00558 }
00559 
00560 MINLINE float normalize_v2_v2(float r[2], const float a[2])
00561 {
00562     float d = dot_v2v2(a, a);
00563 
00564     if (d > 1.0e-35f) {
00565         d = sqrtf(d);
00566         mul_v2_v2fl(r, a, 1.0f / d);
00567     }
00568     else {
00569         zero_v2(r);
00570         d = 0.0f;
00571     }
00572 
00573     return d;
00574 }
00575 
00576 MINLINE float normalize_v2(float n[2])
00577 {
00578     return normalize_v2_v2(n, n);
00579 }
00580 
00581 MINLINE float normalize_v3_v3(float r[3], const float a[3])
00582 {
00583     float d = dot_v3v3(a, a);
00584 
00585     /* a larger value causes normalize errors in a
00586      * scaled down models with camera xtreme close */
00587     if (d > 1.0e-35f) {
00588         d = sqrtf(d);
00589         mul_v3_v3fl(r, a, 1.0f / d);
00590     }
00591     else {
00592         zero_v3(r);
00593         d = 0.0f;
00594     }
00595 
00596     return d;
00597 }
00598 
00599 MINLINE double normalize_v3_d(double n[3])
00600 {
00601     double d = n[0] * n[0] + n[1] * n[1] + n[2] * n[2];
00602 
00603     /* a larger value causes normalize errors in a
00604      * scaled down models with camera xtreme close */
00605     if (d > 1.0e-35) {
00606         double mul;
00607 
00608         d = sqrt(d);
00609         mul = 1.0 / d;
00610 
00611         n[0] *= mul;
00612         n[1] *= mul;
00613         n[2] *= mul;
00614     }
00615     else {
00616         n[0] = n[1] = n[2] = 0;
00617         d = 0.0;
00618     }
00619 
00620     return d;
00621 }
00622 
00623 MINLINE float normalize_v3(float n[3])
00624 {
00625     return normalize_v3_v3(n, n);
00626 }
00627 
00628 MINLINE void normal_short_to_float_v3(float out[3], const short in[3])
00629 {
00630     out[0] = in[0] * (1.0f / 32767.0f);
00631     out[1] = in[1] * (1.0f / 32767.0f);
00632     out[2] = in[2] * (1.0f / 32767.0f);
00633 }
00634 
00635 MINLINE void normal_float_to_short_v3(short out[3], const float in[3])
00636 {
00637     out[0] = (short) (in[0] * 32767.0f);
00638     out[1] = (short) (in[1] * 32767.0f);
00639     out[2] = (short) (in[2] * 32767.0f);
00640 }
00641 
00642 /********************************* Comparison ********************************/
00643 
00644 
00645 MINLINE int is_zero_v2(const float v[3])
00646 {
00647     return (v[0] == 0 && v[1] == 0);
00648 }
00649 
00650 MINLINE int is_zero_v3(const float v[3])
00651 {
00652     return (v[0] == 0 && v[1] == 0 && v[2] == 0);
00653 }
00654 
00655 MINLINE int is_zero_v4(const float v[4])
00656 {
00657     return (v[0] == 0 && v[1] == 0 && v[2] == 0 && v[3] == 0);
00658 }
00659 
00660 MINLINE int is_one_v3(const float v[3])
00661 {
00662     return (v[0] == 1 && v[1] == 1 && v[2] == 1);
00663 }
00664 
00665 MINLINE int equals_v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00666 {
00667     return ((v1[0] == v2[0]) && (v1[1] == v2[1]));
00668 }
00669 
00670 MINLINE int equals_v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00671 {
00672     return ((v1[0] == v2[0]) && (v1[1] == v2[1]) && (v1[2] == v2[2]));
00673 }
00674 
00675 MINLINE int equals_v4v4(const float v1[4], const float v2[4])
00676 {
00677     return ((v1[0] == v2[0]) && (v1[1] == v2[1]) && (v1[2] == v2[2]) && (v1[3] == v2[3]));
00678 }
00679 
00680 MINLINE int compare_v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float limit)
00681 {
00682     if (fabsf(v1[0] - v2[0]) < limit)
00683         if (fabsf(v1[1] - v2[1]) < limit)
00684             if (fabsf(v1[2] - v2[2]) < limit)
00685                 return 1;
00686 
00687     return 0;
00688 }
00689 
00690 MINLINE int compare_len_v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float limit)
00691 {
00692     float x, y, z;
00693 
00694     x = v1[0] - v2[0];
00695     y = v1[1] - v2[1];
00696     z = v1[2] - v2[2];
00697 
00698     return ((x * x + y * y + z * z) < (limit * limit));
00699 }
00700 
00701 MINLINE int compare_v4v4(const float v1[4], const float v2[4], const float limit)
00702 {
00703     if (fabsf(v1[0] - v2[0]) < limit)
00704         if (fabsf(v1[1] - v2[1]) < limit)
00705             if (fabsf(v1[2] - v2[2]) < limit)
00706                 if (fabsf(v1[3] - v2[3]) < limit)
00707                     return 1;
00708 
00709     return 0;
00710 }
00711 
00712 MINLINE float line_point_side_v2(const float l1[2], const float l2[2], const float pt[2])
00713 {
00714     return (((l1[0] - pt[0]) * (l2[1] - pt[1])) -
00715             ((l2[0] - pt[0]) * (l1[1] - pt[1])));
00716 }
